title: Harvard Studies and Notes in Philology and Literature
additional-notes: The first active renewal shown here is the first where the CCE renewal record specifically mentions this serial.  Like a number of renewals for later volumes, it is filed under Books, not under Periodicals.

Some issues of this serial have distinctive titles. Before concluding such issues are in the public domain, search for renewals for books under those titles.  We have not systematically done such searches for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Lloyd Frank for copyright research on this title.
